selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the required output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the selected option label as the final answer.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_angle_in_diagram
new_skill_specs.purpose: Identify and return the measure of a specified angle from a geometric diagram.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The measure of the specified angle as a float.
edge_cases: The angle label does not exist in the diagram.
The diagram is not clear or is missing.

new_skill_specs.name: map_value_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map a given value to the correct multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the option that matches the value.
edge_cases: The value does not match any option.
